_exec_summary.SummaryText:
Sunny Fresh Foods policy is to conduct all business activities in a manner that protects our stakeholders, contractors and the communities in which we have a presence.  We meet or exceed all federal, state and local standards in the operation of our plant.  Our core purpose is to be the supplier of choice for customers worldwide.  Our stakeholders produce value added egg products utilizing liquid egg in either whole, white or yolk form.  We carry a full line of liquid egg products, diced egg and entree products.  Anhydrous Ammonia is used in our refrigeration system to maintain and control temperatures of our manufacturing processes.  This ensures that our products are processed and maintained at proper temperatures to inhibit microbiological growth.
We have Emergency Response Teams on sight that train and drill on a regular basis.  The local fire department tours on a regular basis and reviews our systems for emergency response.  We also review with the fire dept. the key points to know about our refrigeration system and invite them to participate in our emergency response training.  Evacuation drills are held on a regular basis with all stakeholders.  
We conduct regular PM's that are tracked on a computer maintenance management system.  This is allowing us to build history in an organized manner that will allow us to become predictive in our maintenance vs.preventive.  
Management of Change and Pre Start Safety review are central parts of our Process Safety Management system and is adhered to.  
Contractors are required to submit information on their safety programs and an approval is granted.  Before work is started all contractors complete an orientation to ensure understanding of Sunny Fresh Safety policies/rules and permit procedures.  
Sunny Fresh Foods, Monticello, MN has had no ammonia related accidents in the last five years.
We prevent accidents by designing for safety, maintaining our plant, operating safely, auditing and training of stakeholders.  To c

ontinuously improve safety increased staff resources have been added to the EHS function.  This will increase focus on safety and environment.  Improvements to safety and environmental systems include reviewing audit schedules, increasing training for refrigeration operators and all stakeholders, continous improvement of refrigeration operating systems, and integrating MOC and PSSR into all work processes within Sunny Fresh.
